channel.title: Good starting server source
channel.description: Hello, I have created many servers in the past Pvpangel, Silent pkz. Both were very popular but very noobish. Pvpangel was a pickup server with much lag. Silent pkz was good for a while but then dupers came and ruined economy. What source should i use to start a stable server that will not be easily hacked. Thank you, and for people that leave comments like google first, many of the answers were different then each other and I would like to hear some of the same comments so I know which source was most verifiable.

item.title: Good starting server source
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:8, topic:332502”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=428934.msg3953963#msg3953963 date=1332562062]

You should try a NON - delta
Theres some in the download sections

Seriously? I think delta is better than other shit on here. I’ve liked Apollo though.

Hyperion > Shard > Delta > WL > Any badly coded server > PI
[/quote]

What about the crappy 700+ servers?[/quote]
Not worth my time to put into the list.

Read full topic

item.title: Good starting server source
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Paintball3r5, post:4, topic:332502”][quote author=Dustin.mcguire link=topic=428934.msg3149077#msg3149077 date=1268362255]
Hello, I have created many servers in the past
Pvpangel, Silent pkz. Both were very popular but very noobish. Pvpangel was a pickup server with much lag. Silent pkz was good for a while but then dupers came and ruined economy. What source should i use to start a stable server that will not be easily hacked.
Thank you,
and for people that leave comments like google first, many of the answers were different then each other and I would like to hear some of the same comments so I know which source was most verifiable.
[/quote]

OMG DUSTIN WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN LOL!!! I WAS Paintball3r5 ON SILENT PKZ AND I WAS AN ADMIN I LOVED THAT SERVER AND I MISS IT SOOO MUCH BRO!!! MAYBE WE COULD PARTNER UP AND CREATE A NEW ONE!! PM ME!![/quote]

Nice 1 post.

Read full topic
